title: Connect Four
description: Game 'Connect Four' is a two-player game where one tries to have 4 slots connected. You firstly get to choose a player by color and then you click column to drop the your color disc into an empty slot. Pieces fall straight down, occupying the next available space within the column. The objective of the game is to be the first to form a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal line of four of one's own discs.
